member.name: WICGifApplicationExtensionProperties
member.summary: Specifies the application extension metadata properties for a Graphics Interchange Format (GIF) image.

member.name: WICGifApplicationExtensionProperties.WICGifApplicationExtensionApplication
member.summary: [VT_UI1 | VT_VECTOR] Indicates a string that identifies the application.

member.name: WICGifApplicationExtensionProperties.WICGifApplicationExtensionData
member.summary: [VT_UI1 | VT_VECTOR] Indicates data that is exposed by the application.
